-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A portable relational calculator
--   
--   This is a portable relational calculator. Relational data and
--   calculations are written in koshucode. This packages contains
--   <a>koshu</a> command. <a>koshu</a> reads koshucode data, calculates
--   it, and writes the result.
@package koshucode-baala-calculator
@version 0.29.0.0

module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Comment
data CommentDoc
CommentDoc :: [CommentSec] -> CommentDoc
data CommentSec
CommentSec :: String -> [String] -> CommentSec
class Texts a
texts :: Texts a => a -> [String]
emacsModeComment :: String
instance Show CommentSec
instance Eq CommentSec
instance Ord CommentSec
instance Show CommentDoc
instance Eq CommentDoc
instance Ord CommentDoc
instance Texts CommentSec
instance Texts CommentDoc

module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version
versionString :: String

module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Run
data SectionSource c
SectionSource :: Section c -> [String] -> [FilePath] -> SectionSource c
rootSection :: SectionSource c -> Section c
textSections :: SectionSource c -> [String]
fileSections :: SectionSource c -> [FilePath]
runFiles :: CContent v => SectionSource v -> IO ()

-- | Read and union sections from files, and run the section.
hRunFiles :: CContent v => Handle -> SectionSource v -> IO ()
concatMM :: (Monad m, Monoid a) => [m a] -> m a
runCalc :: CContent v => SectionSource v -> IO ()
runCalcTo :: CContent v => FilePath -> SectionSource v -> IO ()
theContent :: CContent c => String -> [Named c] -> Maybe c
readSec :: CContent v => SectionSource v -> IO (AbortOr (Section v))
mkdir :: FilePath -> IO ()
instance Show c => Show (SectionSource c)

module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Exit
prelude :: IO (String, [String])

-- | Print message and exit on 0.
putSuccess :: String -> IO a

-- | Print error message and exit on 1.
putFailure :: String -> IO a
currentEncodings :: IO (String)


-- | A portable relational calculator.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu</tt> command. See
--   <a>vanillaOperators</a> for default argument.
koshuMain :: CContent v => [OpImplement v] -> IO ()
instance Show Option
instance Eq Option
